post.desc:
>"*Orkses is neva defeated in battle. If we win we win, if we die we die fightin' so it don't count. If we runz for it we don't lose eva,* ***cos we can come back for annuver go, see!***"

The last part that I emphasized applies surprisingly well to spell card duels in Touhou. If the description from the *Perfect Memento* still rings true, losses in games can be canon â€“ at least we know that Reimu likes to have rematches until she scores a win.
